name: Born of Fire
description:
#We are currently looking for game testers. Please join our Discord server "Born of Fire" to know more information.#

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a card game like you’ve never seen before. It’s familiar, yet new.
This is a Roguelike, but it isn’t a single player game.
This is a strategy card game, but it isn’t turn-based.
This is a deck-building game, but you aren’t alone. There is an army in your deck.
Now select your hero, choose your allies, and play Born of Fire with players from around the world.

Game Features:
● Innovative time sequence battles for faster pace battles and more excitement.
● You aren’t alone. Place allies with different abilities in your deck to fight alongside you.
● Arrange your defenders and attackers to open the door to victory.
● You will never know what traps your opponent has set for you with their special "Counter" cards.
● Heroes have exclusive rage spells that can turn the battle around.

Exciting Content
● There are two classes with more to come.
● The classic Roguelike mode has random enemies, missions, and rewards.
● You can upgrade your cards. Every battle will make you stronger.
● Collect cards to make a unique deck and battle players from around the world in Duel mode.

Also…
● There will be a new card added to the game every week, including player designs chosen by the community.
● New gameplay or classes will be introduced every month such as the Two-headed Giant mode(2v2) and Ladder mode.
● We will continue to translate the game into more languages. We know how awful it is not being able to read the card descriptions.
